enb_long_title: UNFCCC WORKSHOP ON BEST PRACTICES IN POLICIES AND MEASURES
section_title: A BRIEF HISTORY OF THE FCCC AND THE KYOTO PROTOCOL
sentences: The FCCC was adopted on 9 May 1992, and was opened for signature at the UN Conference on Environment and Development in June 1992.
It entered into force on 21 March 1994, 90 days after receipt of the 50th ratification.
It has currently received 181 instruments of ratification.
